name: Eau de Parfum Sensuelle
description: A captivating floral fragrance with notes of jasmine, rose, and vanilla.

name: Ocean Breeze for Men
description: A fresh aquatic scent with hints of citrus and cedarwood, perfect for daily wear.

name: Midnight Bloom
description: An intense and mysterious oriental perfume with orchid, spice, and dark chocolate notes.

name: Citrus Grove Unisex
description: A vibrant and uplifting citrus blend of bergamot, grapefruit, and neroli.

name: Velvet Oud
description: A luxurious and warm fragrance featuring rich oud, amber, and soft rose petals.

name: Gentleman
description: A classic woody aromatic fragrance for men with notes of vetiver, sandalwood, and leather.

name: Summer Lily
description: A light and airy floral scent with lily of the valley, white musk, and pear.

name: Spiced Amber
description: A warm and inviting fragrance with notes of amber, cinnamon, and tonka bean.

name: Aqua Marine Fresh
description: A clean and invigorating unisex scent inspired by the sea breeze and coastal herbs.

name: Rose Noir Femme
description: An elegant and sophisticated dark rose fragrance with patchouli and blackcurrant.

name: Vanilla Sky Dream
description: A sweet and comforting gourmand fragrance with vanilla bean, caramel, and musk.

name: Sport Extreme Homme
description: A dynamic and energetic citrus-woody fragrance for the active man.

name: Enchanted Forest
description: A mystical woody chypre with notes of oakmoss, bergamot, and wild berries.

name: White Tea Serenity
description: A calming and delicate fragrance with white tea, freesia, and ambrette seed.

name: Leather & Smoke
description: A bold and captivating unisex fragrance with notes of leather, tobacco, and birch tar.

name: Island Hibiscus
description: A tropical floral fruity fragrance with hibiscus, coconut water, and mango.

name: Black Pepper & Cedar
description: A spicy and woody masculine scent with black pepper, cedarwood, and cardamom.

name: Peony Blush Romance
description: A soft and romantic floral fragrance centered around peony, with hints of apple and suede.

name: Green Fig & Vetiver
description: A sophisticated green fragrance with notes of fig leaf, vetiver, and sandalwood.

name: Golden Nectar Elixir
description: A rich and opulent amber floral fragrance with honey, jasmine, and benzoin.
